name: gmail_list_messages
description: List Gmail messages with optional filters (max_results, query, label_ids)

name: gmail_get_message
description: Get a specific Gmail message by ID

name: gmail_send_message
description: Send an email via Gmail

name: gmail_search_messages
description: Search Gmail messages using advanced query syntax

name: chat_list_spaces
description: List all Google Chat spaces the user is a member of

name: chat_send_message
description: Send a message to a Google Chat space

name: chat_list_messages
description: List messages in a Google Chat space

name: sheets_create_spreadsheet
description: Create a new Google Sheets spreadsheet

name: sheets_get_values
description: Read values from a spreadsheet range

name: sheets_update_values
description: Update values in a spreadsheet range

name: sheets_append_values
description: Append values to a spreadsheet

name: drive_list_files
description: List files and folders in Google Drive

name: drive_create_folder
description: Create a new folder in Google Drive

name: drive_delete_file
description: Delete a file or folder from Google Drive

name: drive_share_file
description: Share a Google Drive file with a user

name: forms_create_form
description: Create a new Google Form

name: forms_add_question
description: Add a question to a Google Form

name: forms_get_responses
description: Get all responses from a Google Form

name: calendar_list_events
description: List Google Calendar events

name: calendar_create_event
description: Create a new Google Calendar event

name: calendar_delete_event
description: Delete a Google Calendar event

name: docs_create_document
description: Create a new Google Docs document

name: docs_get_document
description: Get Google Docs document content

name: docs_insert_text
description: Insert text into a Google Docs document

name: docs_append_text
description: Append text to a Google Docs document
